channel.title: Jan Hendrik Metzen
channel.description: My personal blog on python and machine learning

item.title: About
item.description:
The technology behind this site

This site is powered by Pelican -- a static website generator -- and is based on the GitHub page of Kevin Richardson using GitHub pages. Content is written in Markdown, a lightweight markup language that allows one to easily add syntax like headings, anchors, and lists to a page.
item.dc:creator: Jan Hendrik Metzen
